View 1: June 9, 1927
View 2: April 30, 1929
View 3: May 3, 1937
P. L. Sperr

View 1: June 9, 1927

View 3: May 3, 1937
P. L. Sperr
728375f-b.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Hervey Street, Staten Island, NY
728375f-b.original_title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Hervey Street

728423f-b.text:
(1)
Arthur Kill Road, east side, at Hervy Street (Rossville).  The House, on the right, at the S.E. corner of Hervy Street, is the M.C. Hardy home.  The two houses on left bear Nos. 2512 and 2504 respectively.  No. 2512 is the J.J Winants home, and No. 2504 is the E.L. Hanker house.  The latter belonged to Mary Williams in 1898.  The road runs eastward from the point of vantage and makes a sharp bend northward at Hervy Street.

May 5, 1937

P.L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS

(2)
An exclusive view of the M.C. Hardy house, at the S.E. corner of Hervy Street.  It belongs to C.J. Winant in 1874 (Beers's map).  Also shown is the south side of Hervy Street, east from Arthur Kill Road.

May 5, 1937

P.L Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS

(3)
An exclusive view of 2512, at the N.E. corner of Hervy Street.  It belongs to J.J. Winants (1907 and 1898) and earlier to P.L. Cortelyou   (1874).

April 30, 1929

P.L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
